holidays.title: National Bikini Day
holidays.description: Grab your sunscreen—it’s the perfect opportunity to head to the beach.

holidays.title: Armenia Constitution Day
holidays.description: The strength of the Constitution lies in the will of the people to defend it.

holidays.title: Foreign Slovaks Day
holidays.description: A nation’s culture resides in the hearts and the soul of its people.

holidays.title: Independence Day in Algeria
holidays.description: After eight years of war, Algeria gained its independence and we are here to celebrate.

holidays.title: Mechanical Pencil Day
holidays.description: Writing with a pencil adds a personal touch in the age of digital communication.

holidays.title: National Apple Turnover Day
holidays.description: Bite into the crispy and flaky goodness to enjoy the scrumptious flavors of an apple turnover.

holidays.title: National Graham Crackers Day
holidays.description: Enjoy graham crackers as they are or with chocolate/marshmallows, in pies, or on fried items.

holidays.title: National Hawaii Day
holidays.description: Hawaii is proud of both its island traditions and U.S. member-state status.

holidays.title: National Ian Day
holidays.description: This National Ian Day, join us as we discover why we celebrate people with this name!

holidays.title: National Sylvia Day
holidays.description: It’s National Sylvia Day, so show some love for the Sylvias in your life.

holidays.title: National Workaholics Day
holidays.description: Today reminds us to find a good balance between our home and work life.

holidays.title: Pet Remembrance Day
holidays.description: Let us get ready to show our sympathy for the deceased companion animals.

holidays.title: Saints Cyril and Methodius
holidays.description: Saints Cyril and Methodius Day celebrates the arrival of the great Slavic missionaries to Moravia.

holidays.title: Tynwald Day
holidays.description: A day to go over new and old legislation during the outdoor sitting of parliament.

holidays.title: Venezuela Independence Day
holidays.description: Hurray for the yellow, blue, and red. Forever in peace, may our flag wave.

holidays.title: Work Without Your Hands Day
holidays.description: So much for “Work Without Your Hands,” SquarePants. You’ll answer to a higher calling this day.

holidays.title: Brittyy44’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are honoring Brittyy44, the YouTuber famous for her captivating paranormal content.

holidays.title: Pauly D’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s the first cast member of “Jersey Shore” to get his own spin-off show.

holidays.title: Ryann Shane’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress’s career eventually came full circle as she earned more prominence.

holidays.title: Shohei Ohtani’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is Shotime! This amazing baseball player stays winning and hitting in the game!

holidays.title: Tavior Mowry’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mowry, who dreamt of becoming a football player, changed his life to become a singer.
